pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tidy Fundamental Financial Data from 'SEC's 'EDGAR' 'API' // Streamline the process of accessing fundamental financial data from the United States Securities and Exchange Commission's ('SEC') Electronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval system ('EDGAR') 'API' https://www.sec.gov/edgar/sec-api- documentation, transforming it into a tidy, analysis-ready format.
